channel.title: react on Filips Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in react on Filips Blogs

item.title: My Second Blog Title
item.description: Table of contents: · A bit of web apps history: swinging back and forth · How to consume the data on Next.js — getStaticProps & the SSG approach — getServerSideProps & the SSR on-demand approach — Extra benefit of server-side functions — Dynamic routes & getStaticPaths function · Bonus: Serverless functions · Demo app · Conclusion Resources Full Next JS Course: https://academy.eincode.com/next.js A bit of web apps history: swinging back and forth In the old times, the apps’ core was on the back end, running on PHP, Ruby, etc.
